== Ariful Hoque ==
<nowiki>[[File:tiger.jpg]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
Born in Bangladesh on April 1988.<<BR>>
Ex student of Ideal School and College of Dhaka, Bangladesh.<<BR>>
Now living in Rome, Italy with his parents and studying on Computer Engineering in La Sapienza University of Rome after finishing his school life from Liceo Scientifico Statale Francesco D'Assisi there.<<BR>>
He loves to explore new technologies, browse internet, read books and chat with his friends.<<BR>>
